name: Falcon Flying Services
about: Falcon Flying Services, part of the Falcon Flying Group, is a renowned aviation training and maintenance organization. With a rich history dating back to 1947, our EFG Flying School at London Biggin Hill Airport has been a cornerstone for pilot training, offering both private and commercial pilot licenses. Our Falcon Flight Training Academy provides top-level training in the UK and Spain, with courses including Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), Flight Instructor Certificate (FIC), and Multi-engine Piston Rating (MEP). Our maintenance division, certified by the UK CAA, handles a full range of aviation maintenance needs, ensuring aircraft safety and compliance. We pride ourselves on delivering exceptional service and training, fostering strong industry relationships and a commitment to excellence in aviation education and maintenance. Trust Falcon Flying Services for your aviation needs, where quality and professionalism are paramount.
